description: Comcast Cable Communications and Truist Bank have disclosed they were impacted by a data breach at FBCS, and are now informing their respective customers that their data has been compromised. [...]
title: Comcast and Truist Bank customers caught up in FBCS data breach

description: A 21-year-old man from Indiana named Evan Frederick Light pleaded guilty to stealing $37,704,560 worth of cryptocurrency from 571 victims in a 2022 cyberattack. [...]
title: Man pleads guilty to stealing $37 million in crypto from 571 victims

description: Google Pay alarmed users this week after erroneously sending out "new card" added email notifications. Google has acknowledged that the email was "accidental" and that no user information was compromised. [...]
title: Google Pay alarms users with accidental ‘new card’ added emails
